name: Flail Ninja
description:
Juryo is the world's last hope. He'll have to master using his large flail to defeat the Yurei. Careful, though! The flail is a powerful weapon against the demonic Yurei, but it can just as easily destroy the young ninja.

This game was made for the 107th Weekly Game Jam. The theme was “Don’t Touch It!”

Controls

  • Move: Left and Right Arrow, Left Analog Stick or Left and Right D-Pad
  • Jump: Up Arrow or A Button
  • Pull Flail: Space or B Button
